author: Wesley LeBlanc
title: Fox to Broadcast Virtual NASCAR Races Using Real Drivers
description: NASCAR racers will compete in a virtual series of races while its regular season remains postponed due to the Coronavirus pandemic.
content: Fox and NASCAR held a test lap of sorts on March 22 with its eNASCAR iRacing Pro Series Invitational opener and after its success, Fox has decided to air the remainder of the virtual season on its channels.NASCAR racers like Dale Earnhardt Jr. and Bobby Labon… [+1929 chars]
